title: Spanish for Travelers, 2nd Edition
description: In every travel situation, from arrival to departure, Fodor’s Spanish for Travelers makes it easy to speak and understand Spanish, even if you have never studied it before. And it’s backed by Fodor’s, the most trusted name in travel.Fodor’s Spanish for Travelers provides essential words and phrases and comes with an easy-to-use pronunciation key to help you speak like a native. Listen before you leave, while you’re traveling, or once you reach your destination to make sure you can communicate throughout your trip. Fodor’s Spanish for Travelers makes it simple to get by in Spanish.
author: Living Language
